text: Nikola Tesla was born in Smiljan, Lika, Croatia, which was then part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire. His father was a Serbian Orthodox Priest and his mother an inventor of household appliances.
The world's first communication satellite, Telstar, was launched into orbit from Cape Canaveral on a Delta rocket.
The Electronic Frontier Foundation was formally founded, immediately coming to the aid of Steve Jackson Games, who's BBS had been seized by the Secret Service.
